snippet: The billionaire casino magnate's recent purchase of The Las Vegas Review-Journal has prompted concerns that he could use the newspaper to influence a lawsuit against his business empire.
abstract: Billionaire Sheldon Adelson's purchase of newspaper Las Vegas Review-Journal for lavish sum of $140 million has raised suspicions of power play aimed at furthering Adelson's personal interests; some fear Adelson will leverage his ownership of paper to sway outcome of lawsuit against his gambling empire.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA, IAN LOVETT and BARRY MEIER
byline.contributor: Ravi Somaiya and Ian Lovett reported from Las Vegas and Barry Meier from New York. Sydney Ember contributed reporting from New York and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: The billionaire casino magnate's recent purchase of The Las Vegas Review-Journal has prompted concerns that he could use the newspaper to influence a lawsuit against his business empire.

headline.main: Sheldon Adelson’s Purchase of Las Vegas Paper Seen as a Power Play
headline.print_headline: Purchase of Las Vegas Newspaper Is Seen as a Mogul’s Power Play
